question: Which two water bodies are located on both sides of the "Isthmus of Suez"?
explanation: Isthmus of Suez is a strip of land located between the Mediterranean Sea and the Red Sea. It is formed as part of the Gulf of Suez Rift between the Egyptian mainland and the Sinai Peninsula. It forms the boundary between Africa and Asia. It is located within Egypt which holds strategic and historic value because of the presence of the Suez Canal.
